categories.summary:
# Discord Chat Analysis

## 1. Summary
The chat primarily focused on finding and converting VRM avatar models, particularly for characters like Santa, Link, and Mario. Users shared resources for obtaining these models, including toxsam's open source collection and the Vroid Hub platform. The discussion also touched on technical approaches for converting GLB format models to VRM, with suggestions about renaming rigging or using intermediate conversions through FBX format and Mixamo. One user mentioned that for already rigged models, the Blender VRM plugin can be used to assign bones properly. Additionally, there was a brief mention of "Drifters" models being optimized and soon to be released.

## 2. FAQ
Q: Has anyone seen a VRM avatar of Santa, Link (Zelda), or Mario (Brothers)? (asked by CarTarL) A: There's a Santa VRM in toxsam's open source collection, and a Mario model on Vroid Hub (answered by Shiffty and hiroP)
Q: I found a few that are in glb format. Would have to rename all the rigging to get into vrm? (asked by CarTarL) A: If it's already rigged, you just need to assign the bones with the blender VRM plugin (answered by ğ•½ğ–”ğ–šğ–˜ğ–™ğ–†ğ–“)

## 3. Help Interactions
Helper: Shiffty | Helpee: CarTarL | Context: Looking for VRM avatars of specific characters | Resolution: Shared link to opensourceavatars.com for Santa VRM
Helper: hiroP | Helpee: CarTarL | Context: Looking for VRM avatars of specific characters | Resolution: Shared Vroid Hub link and specifically found a Mario model
Helper: BallisticBanana | Helpee: CarTarL | Context: Converting GLB models to VRM format | Resolution: Suggested converting GLB to FBX then using Mixamo for rigging
Helper: ğ•½ğ–”ğ–šğ–˜ğ–™ğ–†ğ–“ | Helpee: CarTarL | Context: Converting rigged models to VRM | Resolution: Advised using Blender VRM plugin to assign bones

## 4. Action Items
Technical: Use Blender VRM plugin to assign bones when converting rigged models to VRM format | Mentioned By: ğ•½ğ–”ğ–šğ–˜ğ–™ğ–†ğ–“
Technical: Convert GLB to FBX then use Mixamo for rigging when preparing models for VRM format | Mentioned By: BallisticBanana
Feature: Look out for optimized Drifters VRMs being released soon | Mentioned By: ğ•½ğ–”ğ–šğ–˜ğ–™ğ–†ğ–“

# Discord Chat Analysis for channel "ğŸª™â”‚hyper"

## 1. Summary
The chat segment contains minimal technical discussion. A user (MUDBONE) inquired about rumors they heard from "whales" regarding a potential new Minecraft-type game being developed, questioning whether the existing Solana token (hyper) would be maintained or diluted. Ash, presumably a team member, responded briefly to clarify that "hyper is and always will be the token," indicating no plans for token changes. Another user (Agent12) noted a lack of GitHub activity for almost three months and requested more regular updates to reduce confusion. The conversation was brief with no detailed technical discussions, decisions, or problem-solving taking place.

## 2. FAQ
Q: Are you going to keep the same token on solana or dilute it at all for the new minecraft type game? (asked by MUDBONE) A: hyper is and always will be the token (answered by ash)
Q: Is there any hope [regarding the project]? (asked by MUDBONE) A: Unanswered

## 3. Help Interactions
Helper: ash | Helpee: MUDBONE | Context: Confusion about token status for rumored new project | Resolution: Clarified that hyper will remain the token

## 4. Action Items
Documentation: Regular project updates needed to reduce community confusion | Mentioned By: Agent12
Technical: Address lack of GitHub activity (no pushes in almost 3 months) | Mentioned By: Agent12
